subject: Hockey, Ice
Concussions
lead_paragraph: A long shot to even make the N.H.L., Derek Boogaard embraced the violent role of enforcer for the Minnesota Wild. But, it was a brutal way to make a living.
snippet: A long shot to even make the N.H.L., Derek Boogaard embraced the violent role of enforcer for the Minnesota Wild. But, it was a brutal way to make a living.
